update t_fee_reconcile
reconcile_code = #{reconcileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update t_fee_reconcile set reconcile_code = #{reconcileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, account_amount = #{accountAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_receivable = #{isReceivable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cancel_ok = #{cancelOk,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, waybill_id = #{waybillId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where reconcile_id = #{reconcileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t1.reconcile_id, t1.reconcile_code, t1.company_id, t1.group_id, t1.account_amount, t1.operator_id, t1.operator_name, t1.is_receivable, t1.create_time, t1.cancel_ok, t1.account_id, t1.waybill_id from t_fee_reconcile t1 left join t_fee_payee

and group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and create_time > concat (#{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'000000')
and create_time < concat (#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'235959')
and reconcile_code like concat('%',#{reconcileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and payer_name like concat('%',#{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
